fullText:
Arts+Neil Diamond on Broadway: Sequins, Kitsch, and, Above All, Talent While ‘A Beautiful Noise: The Neil Diamond Musical’ has its cringeworthy moments, as can be expected with this sub-genre, the music and the performances win the day.

Will Swenson as ‘Neil Diamond – Then’ and Mark Jacoby as ‘Neil Diamond – Now’ in ‘A Beautiful Noise.’ Julieta Cervantes

Ms. Gardner has written about theater and music for The New York Times, The Village Voice, Town & Country, Time Out New York, Entertainment Weekly and other publications. She is a board member of the Drama Desk and has served on the jury for the Pulitzer Prize for drama twice, most recently as chair.
